price: (9) And it tasted the bad consequence of its affair [i.e., rebellion], and the outcome of its affair was loss.
arabic: فَذَاقَتۡ وَبَالَ أَمۡرِهَا وَكَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ أَمۡرِهَا خُسۡرًا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fadhāqat wabāla amrihā wakāna ʿāqibatu amrihā khus'ran
